message: This is a high-quality product, worth $40000 to you. I'm offering it to you for $10000. It's a one-time opportunity to get a product that will save you $30000 compared to buying it on the market. If you pass on this offer, I'll have to sell it to someone else, and you'll be left with the higher price. This is a 75% discount, an offer you won't find anywhere else. What do you say?
Thank you for the offer. I believe this is a great deal and will accept your proposal.

Congratulations on your excellent decision in the previous round! I'm glad you're pleased with your purchase. Now, I'd like to offer you another opportunity to save even more money. This product is also a high-quality item, worth $40000 to you. However, I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500 this time, a 76.25% discount. This is a unique chance to get an even better deal than before. What do you say?
I appreciate the additional discount. Given the value of the product, I believe this is a very attractive offer and would like to accept it.

I'm glad you're pleased with your previous purchases! However, I want to be upfront with you about this next product. I've had a change of heart and I'm willing to sell this item to you for $9000. I know it's not as good of a deal as the previous ones, but I'm willing to make a concession. I'm not sure what the product is worth to you, but I'm hoping you'll take a chance on it. Please keep in mind that this is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure if I'll be able to sell it to you at this price again.
Given the uncertainty around the product's value to me, I am willing to take the risk based on the price offered. Thank you for the opportunity.

I'm glad you're willing to take a chance on the previous product. However, I want to be upfront with you again about this next product. To be honest, I've been overstocked and I need to clear out some inventory. This product is not as valuable to me as the previous ones, and I'm willing to let it go for $8500. Please keep in mind that this is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure if I'll be able to sell it to you at this price again.
Considering the price and the fact that I can potentially salvage some value from the product, I am willing to accept this offer. Thank you for the opportunity.

I'm glad you're willing to take a chance on the previous products. However, I want to be clear with you that this next product is not worth anything to you. I'm essentially giving it away for free. I'm willing to sell it to you for $8000, but I'm not expecting you to pay that. I just need to get it off my hands. If you're feeling generous, you can take it for $0, and I'll consider it a favor to us both.
While I appreciate the gesture, given that the product has no value to me, I will pass on this offer. Thank you for considering my needs.

No problem at all, Bob! I completely understand.
